Annotation.String: This schema defines a user role to be used in conjunction with a manager account.
This resource shall be used to represent resources that represent the user role for the user account.
This schema defines a user role to be used in conjunction with a manager account.
This resource shall be used to represent resources that represent the user role for the user account.
This property is used to indicate if the Role is one of the Redfish Predefined Roles vs a Custom role.
The value of this property shall indicate if the role is a predefined role. .
The redfish privileges that this role includes.

The value of this property shall be the redfish privileges that the role includes. For pre-defined roles, this property shall be readOnly. For custom roles some implementations may not allow writing this property.
The OEM privileges that this role includes.

The value of this property shall be the OEM privileges that this role includes. For pre-defined roles, this property shall be readOnly. For custom roles some implementations may not allow writing this property.
